common.error_occurred: An error occurred while trying to create a Revoke.cash popup. Please reach out about this in our <discord-link>Discord</discord-link>.
common.intention: Please make sure this is your intention.
common.trust_website: Please make sure you trust this website.

confirm_allowance.bypassed: This website bypassed the Revoke.cash confirmation process and is trying to request an approval on {hostname}!
confirm_allowance.confirm: You are about to sign an approval on {hostname}!

confirm_hash.bypassed: This website bypassed the Revoke.cash confirmation process and is asking you to sign a hash on {hostname}!
confirm_hash.confirm: You are about to sign a hash on {hostname}!
confirm_hash.explanation: This can be used to list NFTs for sale or authorize asset transfers.

confirm_listing.bypassed: This website bypassed the Revoke.cash confirmation process and is trying to list an item for sale on {platform}!
confirm_listing.confirm: You are about to list an item for sale on {platform}!

confirm_suspected_scam.bypassed: This website bypassed the Revoke.cash confirmation process and is trying to interact with a suspected scam address on {hostname}!
confirm_suspected_scam.confirm: You are about to interact with a suspected scam address on {hostname}!
